course1.name: Introduc
course1.overview: This course provides an introduction to the basics of web development.

faq.question: Can I enroll in this course if I have no prior coding experience?
faq.answer: Yes, this course is suitable for beginners.

faq.question: Is this course self-paced?
faq.answer: Yes, you can study at your own pace.

reviews.comment: Great course! I learned a lot.
